mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from role r left join user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join menu m on (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''

select m.* from menu m where m.type <> 1 and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from role_menu rm left join role r on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join user_role ur on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName}) order by m.order_num
